Desc.entry: Provides free career coaching for professionals on Jobseekers Allowance. Also offers coaching in academic, career, confidence and intercultural issues to teams as well as individuals. Can help with a wide variety of issues: burn-out prevention, career development, interpersonal issues, lifestyle changes, major life and work changes, mobility and motivation in the work place, stress and anxiety, time management etc. All coaches have ICF accredited qualifications and attend regular Continuing Professional Development events. Initial free consultation.
